Header: Army Puts Up Stall during State Project
Content: The Army was among different state and private sector agencies that put up a separate stall for recruitment of new soldiers during the government’s ‘Government Service to the Village’ project that took place on Saturday (1) in Matale District. The stall at Sangamitta College premises, erected by troops of the 11 Division Headquarters under command to the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) was supported by the Mechanized Infantry Regiment, Directorate of Personnel Administration, Directorate of Pay & Records and Directorate of Recruitment. Several Senior Officers, Officers and Other Ranks attended the occasion.
